I guess this qualifies as art...

This is a little march I wrote in honor of the Kerbals. Suggestions are appreciated.

Cool! It makes me want to salute those brave Astroneers!
Because I loved the art so much an own a wide format professional printer, I put this up on my wall.

I am so damn jelly.
Awesome THRILLMASTER ;D
lol @ Lego Star Destroyer.

Because I loved the art so much an own a wide format professional printer, I put this up on my wall.

You need to put the car in the middle, line it up with Jebs eyes
What's funny is how much cheaper it is for me to make that print than it is to order it. 13x19 is an expensive size apparently(most sites charge 8-20 dollars for something that large)

I guess this qualifies as art...

This is a little march I wrote in honor of the Kerbals. Suggestions are appreciated.

I think the percussion intro is a tad long, but the tune is perfect. It reminds me of the Mushroom Kingdom music from Mario RPG, and it fits the Kerbals just right. So hopeful and naive.

Because I loved the art so much an own a wide format professional printer, I put this up on my wall.

I want one

Oh yeah I should put this here as well since I got imgur to work.

Spoiled for harsh language

This is a little march I wrote in honor of the Kerbals. Suggestions are appreciated.

This should be in the main game, really

Hahaha kinkinhood that's crazy awesome. Much love.

Okay so, apparently my source file for that image is a mess and also lower resolution than I expected, so I can't do as much with it as I originally wanted. But here's kind of a second version, at slightly higher res and with some stuff added. Figured I'd leave it at source res for download and let everyone scale and crop to whatever they need.

If you prefer the old one, that's fine with me, and I think I'm done with this piece for the moment. Use as you see fit.

http://www./?aee9j3648z4kh53

Another short little piece...

Because every interplanetary space badass needs an epic rock theme.

You sir should make the music for the game

Thanks. If you're wanting some kind of print of it tell me and I may be able to work out a deal for ya since it's your awesome art.
Going to do some cleanup on this tommorow and sort out the shading, but what the hell, thought I'd share.
I almost think I should put my lego space shuttle over it.
To those people who made the music, can you upload it as MIDI and link it here? IÂ´d like to try to give it a bit more epic sound.

Going to do some cleanup on this tommorow and sort out the shading, but what the hell, thought I'd share.

wow nice !

To those people who made the music, can you upload it as MIDI and link it here? IÂ´d like to try to give it a bit more epic sound.

**Person

I wrote them using a couple of non-MIDI percussion VSTs. While it does make them sound marginally better than MIDI, it also unfortunately renders it incompatible.

I can provide sheet music, however.

My god. The amazing amount of support and community that has developed behind this game is legendary.

HarvesteR, you should be very proud of what you have done. Very few games developers can claim to have had as much community uptake in such a short time.

With a community like this, anything is possible. Hell you already have people developing art and music (for/about) the game.

If you can, you so should get that artwork done by Riess as a screen somewhere in the game, if not the home page.

My friend you will go far, keep up the good work.

'My god, it's full of explosions!'

May re-do this, the helmet is a bit off.

**Person

I wrote them using a couple of non-MIDI percussion VSTs. While it does make them sound marginally better than MIDI, it also unfortunately renders it incompatible.

I can provide sheet music, however.

IÂ´d rather prefer MIDI because right now I donÂ´t really got the time to reprogram MIDI parts based on sheet music, if the other instruments are based on MIDI notes I certainly could reprogram the percussion myself.
